title-of-article: Pre-order the Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield Expansion Pass from the Nintendo Official UK Store and get 50% off selected Pokémon merch!
content:
If you pre-order the Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield Expansion Pass from the Nintendo Official UK Store you can get a Scorbunny, Sobble or Grookey soft toy or a Starter Pokémon Mug for half price.

To redeem, simply add the Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield Expansion Pass and your choice of merch to your basket and enter the relevant promo code:

Find out more about the Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield Expansion Pass here.

*The two expansions included in the Expansion Pass, ‘The Isle of Armor’ and ‘The Crown Tundra’, cannot be purchased separately.
